name: Big Potato Buzzer
description:
COMPATIBLE WITH THE FOLLOWING GAMES:

Blockbuster
Rolling Stone
Top of the Pops
US Weekly
MTV

Got everything you need to get the party started, but missing a spare pair of batteries? No need to start emptying the TV remote just yet — the Big Potato Buzzer is here to save the day!

PLEASE NOTE: The Big Potato Buzzer is intended to be used alongside our party games. If you don’t own the games, this app won’t be much use to you — unless you’re just looking to jazz up your phone a bit.

Whether you’re shouting out movies in The Blockbuster Game or power-sliding into a rock showdown in The MTV Game, this app will give you everything you need to keep the timer ticking. Featuring one timer for the Head to Head battle, and another one for the triples charades showdown.

Good luck, have fun and don’t lose track of time!

Team Tato x
